setup.adderReminder: Start with a random Adder card in your hand
setup.gameSetupGuide: How to Set Up the Game
setup.gameSetupIntro: Set up the game as normal, with the following changes:
setup.gameSetupStep1: Return 45 cards from the draw pile to the game box (as in a 2-player game)
setup.gameSetupStep2: You need only 1 winter card, which you shuffle with the last 10 cards of the draw pile
setup.gameSetupStep3: Draw 6 cards into your hand and place cave 3 in front of you
setup.gameSetupStep4: Shuffle the 20 Automa cards and place them in a face-down Automa deck
setup.gameSetupStep6: Carry out the action of your cave and start playing
